item.title: Taxonomies in liquorice
item.description: My Hugo theme liquorice was updated yesterday to add simple support for Taxonomies. Both categories and tags is supported both as list view and as the ingress part of a single article. In order to use it you need to configured in your site configuration (see documentation), in TOML this is basically adding: [indexes] category = "categories" tag = "tags" You then add the categories and / or tags per article in the front-matter like:
